# CheckIndexAttribute

## InvalidColumnMeasurementType

<!-- Description, Properties, ... sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- REPLACE ME AUTO-GENERATION -->

### Details

The column used as primary key of a table should be of Mesurement/Type 'string' or 'number'.
